description: '''Ibrahim Ferrer''' (20 February 1927 – 6 August 2005) was a Cuban singer who played with the group Los Bocucos for nearly forty years. He also performed with [[Conjunto Sorpresa]], [[Chepín y su Orquesta Oriental]], and [[Mario Patterson]].  After his retirement in 1991, he was brought back in the studio to record with the [[Afro-Cuban All Stars]] and [[Buena Vista Social Club]], in March 1996. He then toured internationally with these revival groups and recorded several solo albums for [[World Circuit (record label)|World Circuit]], before his death in 2005.
